name: I am eel
description:
Play this incredibly short game about an eel in a lake bound for human pollution and ignorance.

Art Credits: A Britto

Final scene music from Ruzab K's Album: Contrast- About death(outro)

Scene 1 and 2's music by A Britto

Programming by Sachin Kishan

Made for the Studio to Stage Game Jam in 36 hours.

If you would like to donate towards ocean conservation efforts, please look at the following organizations:

Ocean Conservacy.org

Oceana

The Ocean Cleanup
